explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning methods (KNN and LSTM) for stock price prediction.
explanations.deep learning: The paper discusses deep learning methods, specifically LSTM, as part of its predictive modeling approach.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper applies LSTM as one of the deep learning methods for forecasting the CAC 40 index.
explanations.LSTM: The paper uses LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory) as a deep learning technique for stock price prediction during the COVID-19 pandemic.
